titles.title: A joint resolution directing the removal of United States Armed Forces from hostilities in Syria that have not been authorized by Congress.
A joint resolution directing the removal of United States Armed Forces from hostilities in Syria that have not been authorized by Congress.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
Motion to discharge Senate Committee on Foreign Relations made.
Motion to discharge Senate Committee on Foreign Relations rejected by Yea-Nay Vote. 13 - 84. Record Vote Number: 333.
